info.name: NightMod Black - Global Theme
info.description:
Matrix Black (with Green links)
All shade in black/gray... Not very cleany style, just want to share, test it it's Free ;)
Not *Hard* background change (just color) to respect design with icons/sprits using background images... so it's some time not totaly black if website use white images has background.
info.additionalInfo:
I Use it under Firefox the best Browser.

I add some fixes for 
+ facebook (some quick fix)
+ open.spotify (maj progress color)
+ youtube (maj progress color)
+ Messenger.com (fb) (maj bubble colors)
+ France.tv player
+ Firefox searchs in black

Last ver : 
* add Textarea Matrix style
* add img + background-url : dimmer (transition opacity onmousehover)

+some fixes for
Extensions :
TextMark (default setings colors)
-- > https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/textmarkerpro/?src=api
and _blank all links greasescript
-- > http://diveintomark.org/projects/greasemonkey/

Regex use to exclude domains... not very pretty

---
BONUS  -- You can Add the dark skin of firefox dev edition and make it more compact with my style  
https://userstyles.org/styles/132039/firefox-developer-edition-compact
